name: Empty Cloak
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

traits.name: Diligent Sentinel
traits.desc: Empty cloaks are designed to watch for intruders. They gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

traits.name: Shadow Construction
traits.desc: Empty cloaks are designed with a delicate shadow construction. They burst into pieces, then dissipate into shadow, on a critical hit.

traits.name: Wrapping Embrace
traits.desc: Empty cloaks can share the same space as one Medium or smaller creature. The empty cloak has advantage on attack rolls against any creature in the same space with it.

actions.name: Razor Cloak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shadow Snare
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: Large or smaller creatures are restrained. To escape, the restrained creature or an adjacent ally must use an action to make a successful DC 14 Strength check. The shadow snare has 15 hit points and AC 12.
